Room.Name: Darwin's Study
Room.ShortDescription: This is where Darwin comes to have some peace and quiet.
Room.LongDescription: In addition, the plush surroundings provide a nice place to entertain guests. The room is dimly lit by a gas lantern hanging from the ceiling, and several tables surround a roll-top desk at the northern wall. On the desk can be seen several large stacks of papers that appear to be notes on the various species that inhabit Oceancrest.
